context: A security incident involving suspicious exploration activities was detected. A process on host `mb-winclient` invoked a series of Windows commands using `powershell.exe`. This host relates to several accounts, including 'pwilson'. Some of the commands and processes identified include `powershell.exe c:\script\contosoadfsblatempcreds.ps1` and `whoami.exe /user`. The suspicious activity indicates that attackers may be attempting to identify valuable assets and coordinate lateral movement across the network.
question: Related to this alert, there was a Windows executable file that was renamed and launched. Can you identify the account name associated with the system executable that was renamed and launched?
solution_steps: A process `powershell.exe` was used to execute a suspicious sequence of exploration activities on 2024-07-04 22:35:03.197761+00:00.
A system executable file was renamed and launched, potentially by a `SYSTEM` account, on 2024-07-04 22:35:01.543723+00:00.
